prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon with a sleek, elegant design and a mystical aura.
Imagine a mythical creature that can manipulate space and time using its powerful abilities.
Generate a small, playful Pokemon that embodies the essence of psychic energy and curiosity.
Show me a legendary Pokemon with a cute, round body and large expressive eyes.
Design a Pokemon that floats gracefully and has a soft, pastel color palette.
Make a creature that resembles a small cat but has magical powers and a mysterious background.
Give me a Pokemon that can teleport and has a charming, whimsical personality.
